text: John Rogers Galvin (May 13, 1929 â€“ September 25, 2015) was an American army general. He served as the sixth dean of the Fletcher School of Law and Diplomacy at Tufts University. He was a member of the U.S. Commission on National Security/21st Century. He was born in Wakefield, Massachusetts. Galvin died in Jonesboro, Georgia, aged 86. ==References== Category:1929 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Military people from Massachusetts Category:American generals
title: John Galvin (general)
